page.title: 17A 7 year old's Sunday.
page.content: Yesterday I woke up and lay in for about 15 mins. then I got up and went downstairs. Dad was already up because it was 7.45a.m. I put some milk into the microwave and set it at 2, but that was too much and it all bubbled over. By that time mum was up and she cleaned it up while I put my Weetabix in a bowl. I watched T.V.while eating my breakfast. Then I went upstairs and put on my jogging suit and went into the garden and rode my red bike. After this we played schools.After a picnic lunch I put on my Brownie uniform to march in the St. George's Day Parade. After the march we sang the National Anthem. When we got home it was quite late and after our chicken dinner I put on my nightie and went to bed. Written by Lisa Mitchell.
